lines.text: [Chester has the hiccups]
Can't you suppress it somehow?
Frighten me.
I can't, I haven't got a mirror.
Experience is the best teacher.
Oh, experience is the best teacher, huh?
Naturally, and I'm a Ph.D.
Yeah, a pin-headed dope.
I'll have a lemonade.
[sees looks of surprise, snarls]
In a dirty glass.
Am I dead?
I can't tell, you always look that way.
Yeah? Well, I ain't afraid to die. I just hate being killed, that's all.
As far as I'm concerned, this picture's over right now.
[Duke loses a talent show to a trained monkey]

[to Duke]
Next time I bring Sinatra.

[singing]
You wouldn't dare be too bold, would you? And think that my hand was to hold, would you? And you wouldn't play on my sympathy, then take advantage of me... would you? You shouldn't be quite so near, should you? Or whisper those words in my ear, should you? You can't get romantic; that, you know, takes two. But darling, if I would... would you?
Chester, you'd better face it - the cards say "Alaska!"
No wonder - it's a cold deck!
If those hoodlums ever get off that boat, we'll be smiling ear to ear... with our throats!
Don't be facetious!

[confused]
Oh, keep politics out of this!
Everything is cold! My nose is an iceberg.
Iceberg? That's a glacier.
